keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: Serve this flan warm with salad or pack in your lunchbox to eat cold.

method.text: Roll out the pastry on a lightly floured surface and use to line two 13 cm round loose-based fluted flan tins. Chill for 10-15 min. Prick the bases. Place in the oven and bake blind for about 10 min until just cooked though.
Meanwhile, melt the butter or margarine in a pan and gently saute the leek for 3-5 min until softened. Cool slightly.
Beat the curd cheese to soften. Slowly beat in the eggs and milk. Stir in the parsley and seasoning.
Divide the leeks, ham and tomato between the two cases. Pour in the egg mixture.
Place in the oven for 20-25 min until just set and golden brown. Serve hot or cold.

title: Tomato, ham and curd cheese flan
